title: Kylie Versoza and Jake Cuenca finally confirm relationship
text:
19 Sep – Jake Cuenca and Kylie Versoza finally made a direct confirmation that the two of them are in a relationship.

As reported on Cosmo, TV host Boy Abunda asked the question recently on his show, "Tonight with Boy Abunda", reminding Cuenca that he once said that he will only confirm things when Versoza is with him, to which the actor finally confirmed as he held the actress' hand, "Yes, we are [dating]."

"Isn't that obvious?" Versoza added.

The couple revealed that they first met on the set of the MMFF movie, "Ang Panday", but that Versoza was not interested at first since Cuenca was not her type. However, they soon became friends and started dating after working in ABS-CBN's "Los Bastardos".

Versoza also denied that Cuenca was the reason she ended things with businessman Michael Needham, saying that it just didn't work out between them.

As to whether the two of them have plans to get married, Cuenca said, Jake said, "We're taking it a day at a time. But for me, for the first time in my life, I can see it in the horizon."

"Jake and I aren't the youngest of people. We're not teenagers anymore. We're two mature adults. We have our own careers. We're two adults living our own lives but we complete each other," said the former beauty queen.

(Photo Source: Kylie Versoza Instagram)
description: The couple made their relationship official on "Tonight with Boy Abunda"
